metadata.title: CVE-2021-28951 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in fs/io_uring.c in the Linux kernel through5.11.8. It allows attackers to cause a denial of service (deadlock) becauseexit may be waiting to park a SQPOLL thread, but concurrently that SQPOLLthread is waiting for a signal to start, aka CID-3ebba796fa25.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
